data.eml:eml: Species of the genus Rhipidia Meigen from Taiwan (Diptera, Limoniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Xiao, Yang, Yan Li Ding (2012): Species of the genus Rhipidia Meigen from Taiwan (Diptera, Limoniidae). Zootaxa 3247: 32-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280535
